thread.section_title: Grange Rochester Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent location
thread.title_full: Excellent location - Review of Grange Rochester Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Joanne B
title: Excellent location
text:
I stayed for 2 nights in a superior room. Great sized room and fantastic shower. Breakfast was lovely included typical English hot buffet and then selection of fruits, yogurt, juices and option of toast, tea and coffee. I ate in the restaurant the first night not a great selection of meals but food was to high standard. I preferred their sister hotel round the corner called the Grange Wellington.
The location is great less than a 10 minute walk from Victoria station!
Staff were all friendly and check in was quick.
